verbs.description: As [ARG1: Robert Mueller 's investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election] [V: heats] up , one notorious Trump campaign operative with strong ties to Russia has , somehow , evaded scrutiny : Trump personal lawyer Rudy Giuliani .
